name: The commonwealth of man
startIntroPart1: Glory to the commonwealth! your people have full hope that you and your comrades will be able to lead them to become the most powerful empire in the world. will you prove them right and build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You stand in the way of our glorious expansion, we are on the right side of history!
defeated: I suppose thats it then, well played
introduction: Welcome to the greatest country in the world! The party ensures it stays that way so don't stand in our way
neutralHello: Sergey Andreev of the party speaking, how may i help you?
hateHello: We have no intrest in diplomacy with you.
afterPeace: Very well, The party ne longer sees this lost of life as necessary.
tradeRequest: The party offers you this exceptional trade!.
uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus
